p.d: Angele's mother convinces Bastien that her daughter is losing her mind and should be sectioned. But Angele manages to escape. Certain that she knows the murderer, she persuades Favard to restart the searches. In the clinic's vegetable garden, they find what they'd been looking for from the start: Ana's heart... Directed by: Vincent Lannoo (France, 2018) Screenplay: Jeanne Le Guillou, Bruno Dega Cast: Noémie Schmidt (Angele Maury), Béatrice Dalle (Élisabeth Favard), Hippolyte Girardot (Raphaël Santi), Judith El Zein (Alexandra Santi), Samuel Theis (Simon), Grégoire Leprince-Ringuet (Maxime), Mylene Demongeot (Rose), Achille Ridolfi (Louis), Émilie Dequenne (Camille), Scali Delpeyrat (Guillaume), Florence Thomassin (Valérie), Antoine Gouy (Bastien), Jérémy Gillet (Arnaud), Yaël Abecassis (Iris Galmont) Genre: detective Awards: Pyrénées d'Or prize for the best mini-series, audience prize for the best mini-series, 2019 Luchon Festival for Television Creation.
